title: Qualcomm validates Samsungâ€™s LPDDR5X DRAM for Snapdragon chips
content:
In November last year, Samsung announced the world’s first LPDDRD5X DRAM chip for mobile devices. The new chip promises significantly faster data transfer speed while consuming less power than LPDDR5 RAM. We have yet to see a commercial phone with LPDDR5X RAM, but that may change soon as Qualcomm has now validated the new memory

The post Qualcomm validates Samsung’s LPDDR5X DRAM for Snapdragon chips appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung has announced that its 14nm-based LPDDR5X DRAM chip has been successfully validated by Qualcomm for use with Snapdragon chipsets.
